These look really useful! Hope to see what else you put out down the line, random or not

Updated to v.0.0.2

New parts added

I would Download If i Wasn't A almost-Stock parts guy ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)![230e998cbe1bb8d9c9caad2988b956ee.jpg](https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/23/0e/99/230e998cbe1bb8d9c9caad2988b956ee.jpg) narwals

> Ckan?

It will be added to CKAN down the line. This pack is very much a WIP and there is still much to be done. What is currently in the pack is not worthy of CKAN or main release page (=

> 
> It will be added to CKAN down the line. This pack is very much a WIP and there is still much to be done. What is currently in the pack is not worthy of CKAN or main release page (=

Don't be too hard on yourself. That's how my mods started too. Just various random parts that I wanted to have. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> It will be added to CKAN down the line. This pack is very much a WIP and there is still much to be done. What is currently in the pack is not worthy of CKAN or main release page (=

I think they're quite nice! I especially like the booster sep rings idea.

> 
> Don't be too hard on yourself. That's how my mods started too. Just various random parts that I wanted to have. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Thats reassuring ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I use quite a few of your mods in my various installs. Great mods!

I need to spend more time doing proper texturing as all the parts in the pack only have "placeholder" textures at the moment.

- - - Updated - - -

Thanks! I just got tired of putting separatrons everywhere, so decided to make it a bit easier on myself ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
